content.rendered:
PROJECT DESCRIPTION
  • Addition and alteration works to the existing Tanah Merah Station and existing viaducts.
  • The scope of works includes the construction of an additional platform and concourse in Tanah Merah Station along with two entrances linked by an underpass near the Tanah Merah Kechil Avenue intersection, and related road and drainage works. It also includes the addition of tracks and viaducts to run parallel to the existing EWL, reception tracks connecting to, and forming junctions with the EWL, and connections to the new depot.
CLIENT

Land Transport Authority

LOCATION

Tanah Merah

COMPLETION YEAR

2025 (In progress)

AWARDS
  • WSH Performance (SHARP) Award 2020
  • LTA Annual Safety Award Convention 2019 – CHAMPION

    LTA Contractors Challenge Shield
    Safety & Health Certificate of Excellence & Finalist (Category A)
    Accident-Free Recognition Award (Category 1)

  • WSH Performance (SHARP) Award 2019
